Name:
Vengeance
Vengeance
Minas Gerais
Builder: Swan Hunter, Tyne and Wear, United Kingdom
Fate:
Loaned to Royal Australian Navy
Returned to Royal Navy, then sold to Brazilian Navy
Scrapped 2004
Propulsion: Parsons geared turbines, 2 shafts, 42,000 shp (31,000 kW)
Range: 6,200 nautical miles (11,500 km; 7,100 mi) at 23 knots (43 km/h; 26 mph)
Armament:
Initial:
6 × quadruple QF 2 pounder naval guns
19 × Oerlikon 20 mm cannon
1945:
6 × quadruple 2-pounder guns
8 × Bofors 40 mm guns
11 × Oerlikons
1952:
12 × Bofors
32 × Oerlikons
